edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.outputter
Interface AdornedWordOutputter

All Known Implementing Classes:
ByteStreamAdornedWordOutputter, ConsoleAdornedWordOutputter, DefaultAdornedWordOutputter, ListAdornedWordOutputter, PrintStreamAdornedWordOutputter, SimpleXMLAdornedWordOutputter
public interface AdornedWordOutputter

Interface for generating adorned word output.
